title: Ticket #6846: Don't print 'Job was not checkpointed.' if job not standard universe
description: It's pointless and has confused CHTC users to print "Job was not checkpointed" if the job in question was not a standard universe job (especially) because of self-checkpointing jobs in vanilla universe.
remarks:
2018-Dec-29 19:03:23 by tlmiller:
Changed the log message rather than removed it because then the parser doesn't have to change.

2018-Dec-29 19:07:16 by tlmiller:
Does this need a release note? (And if so, in which section? It's not really a feature or a bug fix.)

2019-Jan-02 10:14:04 by gthain:
This doesn't merit a release note -- we don't need to pollute the release notes with every change.
check_ins: 2018-Dec-28 18:13   Check-in [55930]: (#6846) Change event log text to be less confusing. (By Todd L Miller )
creator: tlmiller
